## EthersLiquity.repaySTAR() method

Adjust existing Trove by repaying some of its debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
repaySTAR(amount: any, ICRWithFees: any, overrides: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | any | The amount of STAR to repay. |
|  ICRWithFees | any |  |
|  overrides | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

any

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [EthersTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ repaySTAR: amount })

```
